mapper.select: SELECT A.QG_ID, A.GROUP_NAME, A.USE_YN, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QUEST WHERE QG_ID = A.QG_ID) CNT, DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(A.UPDATE_DATE, A.CREATE_DATE), '%y.%m.%d %H:%i') LAST_UPDATE_DATE, IFNULL(C.USER_NAME, B.USER_NAME) LAST_UPDATE_USER, 'N' NEW_FLAG FROM QUEST_GROUP A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER B ON A.CREATE_USER = B.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USER C ON A.UPDATE_USER = C.USER_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND USE_YN = #{useYn} AND GROUP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{groupName},'%') ORDER BY A.GROUP_NAME

SELECT QG_ID, SEQ, TYPE, QUESTION, QA1, QA2, QA3, QA4, USE_YN, ORD, DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(A.UPDATE_DATE, A.CREATE_DATE), '%y.%m.%d %H:%i') LAST_UPDATE_DATE, IFNULL(C.USER_NAME, B.USER_NAME) LAST_UPDATE_USER, 'N' NEW_FLAG FROM QUEST A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER B ON A.CREATE_USER = B.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USER C ON A.UPDATE_USER = C.USER_ID WHERE QG_ID = #{QG_ID} ORDER BY ORD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QUEST(QG_ID, SEQ, TYPE, QUESTION, QA1, QA2, QA3, QA4, USE_YN, ORD, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER) VALUES (#{QG_ID},#{SEQ},#{TYPE},#{QUESTION},#{QA1},#{QA2},#{QA3}, #{QA4}, #{USE_YN}, #{ORD},CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,#{SESSION_USER_ID})
mapper.select: SELECT DATA.* FROM ( SELECT QG_ID, GROUP_NAME, USE_YN, DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(UPDATE_DATE,CREATE_DATE), '%y.%m.%d %H:%i') CREATE_DATE FROM QUEST_GROUP WHERE 1 = 1 AND USE_YN = #{useYn} AND GROUP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{groupName},'%') ORDER BY GROUP_NAME ) DATA LIMIT #{limitStart},#{limitUnit}
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM QUEST_GROUP WHERE 1 = 1 AND USE_YN = #{useYn} AND GROUP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{groupName},'%')

SELECT DATA.* FROM ( SELECT D.CATEGORY_NAME ,A.COURSE_ID ,A.COURSE_CODE ,B.COURSE_NAME ,IFNULL(E.ANSWER1_CNT,0) ANSWER1_CNT ,IFNULL(E.ANSWER2_CNT,0) ANSWER2_CNT ,IFNULL(E.ANSWER3_CNT,0) ANSWER3_CNT ,IFNULL(E.ANSWER4_CNT,0) ANSWER4_CNT FROM COURSE A LEFT OUTER JOIN COURSE_CODE B ON A.COURSE_CODE = B.COURSE_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT C3.CODE C3_CODE, C2.CODE C2_CODE, C1.CODE C1_CODE, CONCAT(C1.CODE_NAME,' > ',C2.CODE_NAME,' > ',C3.CODE_NAME) CATEGORY_NAME FROM CATEGORY C3 LEFT OUTER JOIN CATEGORY C2 ON C3.PARENT_CODE = C2.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN CATEGORY C1 ON C2.PARENT_CODE = C1.CODE WHERE C3.DEPTH = 3) D ON B.CODE = D.C3_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT COURSE_ID, SUM(IF(ANSWER = '1',1,0)) ANSWER1_CNT, SUM(IF(ANSWER = '2',1,0)) ANSWER2_CNT, SUM(IF(ANSWER = '3',1,0)) ANSWER3_CNT, SUM(IF(ANSWER = '4',1,0)) ANSWER4_CNT FROM USER_QUEST GROUP BY COURSE_ID ) E ON E.COURSE_ID = A.COURSE_ID WHERE A.COURSE_KIND IN ('NORMAL','COMPANY')
AND D.C1_CODE = #{c1Code} AND D.C2_CODE = #{c2Code} AND D.C3_CODE = #{c3Code} AND B.COURSE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{courseName},'%') ORDER BY D.CATEGORY_NAME,B.COURSE_NAME,A.CHASU DESC ) DATA LIMIT #{limitStart},#{limitUnit}
